rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0001
rows.name:
There's a fruit in Invidia called a Black
Pomegranate.

rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0002
rows.name:
And each one you eat's got a different
flavor. Sweet, sour, bitter...

rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0003
rows.name:
When Vandham brought us here,
he gave us all Black Pomegranates.

rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Back then, it tasted really bitter and
I spat it all out. Vandham burst out
laughing.

rows.label: tlk41100141_02_msg0005
rows.name:
And now, just like that, he's gone.
This is why you can't trust grown-ups...
